core

Class UserFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.UserFacade

  • public class UserFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    A user facade class that pass all operations a User can do to corresponding manager class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Construct a core.UserFacade with username, allUser, unfreezeRequests, a list of all reportedUsers, a list of all itemRequests send by users, newestItemId for

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserFacade

        public UserFacade(java.lang.String currUsername,
                  EntityAndReverterCollection entityAndReverterCollection,
                  IdCounterCollection idCounterCollection,
                  RequestCollection requestCollection,
                  ThresholdCollection thresholdCollection)
        Construct a core.UserFacade with username, allUser, unfreezeRequests, a list of all reportedUsers, a list of all itemRequests send by users, newestItemId for
        Parameters:
        currUsername - username of the user currently using.
        entityAndReverterCollection - a EntityAndReverterCollection for constructing a ReverterManager
        idCounterCollection - a IdCounterCollection for constructing a UserItemManager
        requestCollection - a RequestCollection for constructing a UserStatusManager
        thresholdCollection - a ThresholdCollection for constructing a TradeThresholdManager

      • createLendingSuggestion

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> createLendingSuggestion(java.lang.String borrowerId)
        Suggests a list of items from User to lend to borrower. Only items that are both in User's itemAvailable and borrower's wishList are included.
        Parameters:
        borrowerId - the id of the borrow transaction
        Returns:
        a list of item that are both in lender's available list and borrower's wish list.

        Returns:
        whether the action was done or not.

      • reportUser

        public boolean reportUser(java.lang.String reportedUsername,
                          java.lang.String reason)
        Reports another user for inappropriate actions. Report will only be successful if both user exits in the system and the user is not reporting him/herself.
        Parameters:
        reportedUsername - the user who is reported
        reason - the reason why this user has been reported
        Returns:
        true if the report is successful

      • switchVacationStatus

        public boolean switchVacationStatus()
        Turns on vacation status of the user with username if the status is off, otherwise turn it off. No action can be made if the user is not in the system.
        Returns:
        true if the user on vacation.

      • getNewestTradeId

        public int getNewestTradeId()
        Return the newest trade id
        Returns:
        the newest trade id

      • getThreeRecentTradeItem

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getThreeRecentTradeItem()
        Gets three recent trade item information of User.
        Returns:
        a list of information about at most 3 recent traded Items in Trade. An empty list if no trade happened.

      • getTopThreeTradePartner

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopThreeTradePartner()
        Gets information about 3 most frequent trader partner of User.
        Returns:
        a list of information about at most 3 most frequent trader partner with given User. An empty list if no trade happened.

      • agreeToTrade

        public int agreeToTrade(int tradeId)
        Agree to a trade request. Before this function returns true, this trade is not started.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of the Trade that user agree to a trade request
        Returns:
        0 agree to trade successfully, 1 fail because user is the initiator, 2 fail because trade is NOT_STARTED, 3 fail because items has been traded, other digit means unknown reason.

      • denyTrade

        public int denyTrade(int tradeId)
        Denies a trade request. If the action is successful, add ActionReverter to reverterManager.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of the Trade that user agree to a trade request
        Returns:
        0 deny trade successfully, 1 fail because user is the initiator, 2 fail because trade is NOT_STARTED, other digit means unknown reason.

      • createBorrowingSuggestion

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> createBorrowingSuggestion()
        Suggest a list of items user might like depends on the user's most frequent borrow types.
        Returns:
        a list, with the first thing a string of the user's most frequent borrow types, the rest of thing the items the user may like as Strings.

      • requestTrade

        public boolean requestTrade(int itemId1To2,
                            int itemId2To1,
                            boolean isPermanent)
        Requests a trade on behalf of this User. Request will only be successful if the Item this User wants to borrow exists and can be borrow by him. If this User want to lend Item to the responder of this trade, that Item must be in his ItemAvailable.
        Parameters:
        itemId1To2 - An Item that User with username1 want to lend to User with username username2.
        itemId2To1 - An Item that username1 want username2 to borrow.
        isPermanent - Equals true if the trade initiated is a permanent trade, false if it is a temporary trade.
        Returns:
        true if the trade is requested successfully.

      • getTradesInfo

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getTradesInfo()
        Find all information of Trade of User that match tradeStatus and meetingIDs.
        Returns:
        a List of String which contain the information of Trades.

      • getCurrentMeetingRelated

        public int getCurrentMeetingRelated(int tradeId)
        Gets the meetingId of the currently ongoing meeting about this trade.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of Trade.
        Returns:
        null if Trade not exists, or return meetingId of the currently ongoing meeting about this trade. If no meeting is ongoing, return -1.

      • getTradeThresholds

        public int[] getTradeThresholds()
        Gets a threshold related to Trade. It can be maxIncompleteTrade, maxWeeklyTransactions, or minLendBorrowDifference.
        Returns:
        the corresponding threshold being asked for.

      • tradeNotStarted

        public boolean tradeNotStarted(int tradeId)
        Return whether the Trade is on the NOT_STARTED status.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - tradeId of the Trade
        Returns:
        true iff the trade is NOT_STARTED.

      • getNewestMeetingId

        public int getNewestMeetingId()
        Return the newest meeting id
        Returns:
        the newest meeting id

      • getMeetingInfo

        public java.lang.String getMeetingInfo(int meetingId)
        Find the information of Trade of given meeting ID
        Parameters:
        meetingId - the id of meeting
        Returns:
        String of information of meeting, otherwise, empty string

      • createMeeting

        public boolean createMeeting(int tradeId,
                             java.lang.String location,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime time)
        Creates a new the meeting with location, time, and userOrder. Increase TimesEdited of the user who creates the meeting. Add the meeting to meetingRelated of the Trade with tradeId if the meeting is created successfully.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of Trade related to this meeting.
        location - the location of the meeting.
        time - the time of the meeting.
        Returns:
        true if the meeting is created and added successfully

      • confirmMeetingArrangement

        public boolean confirmMeetingArrangement(int tradeId)
        Confirm time and place of this meeting, given userOrder. Confirmation of the meeting can be made only when the user has not confirmed and the other one has.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of Trade related to this meeting.
        Returns:
        true if the confirmation is made, false otherwise.

      • confirmMeetingOccurred

        public boolean confirmMeetingOccurred(int tradeId)
        Confirm that the meeting has taken place offline. This confirmation will be successful only when the time and place of the meeting is both confirmed and the user has not confirm meeting occurred before.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of Trade related to this meeting
        Returns:
        true iff confirmation is successful.

      • editMeeting

        public boolean editMeeting(int tradeId,
                           java.time.LocalDateTime meetingTime,
                           java.lang.String location)
        Edits the time and location of the current meeting. Edit is successful only if the user haven't exceed edit limit.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - the id of Trade related to this meeting
        meetingTime - the meeting date and time
        location - the meeting location
        Returns:
        true if edited meeting successfully. false if the user is exceeding his edit limit.

      • getMeetingThresholds

        public int[] getMeetingThresholds()
        Gets maxMeetingLateTime and maxMeetingEdits.
        Returns:
        maxMeetingLateTime, maxMeetingEdits.
